mapper.insert: insert into downtime( down_code, stop_date, down_reason, down_manager, remark, fac_code) values (('DOW' || lpad(downtime_seq.nextval, 4, '0')), current_date , #{downReason} , #{downManager} , #{remark} , #{facCode})
mapper.update: update facility set fac_status = case when fac_status = 'Y' then 'N' else fac_status end where fac_code = #{facCode}

mapper.select: select f.fac_name, f.fac_code , d.down_code, d.start_date, d.stop_date, d.down_reason, d.down_manager, d.remark from facility f join downtime d on (f.fac_code = d.fac_code) order by down_code desc

and TRUNC(d.stop_date) between to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{stopDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select f.fac_code, fac_name, to_char(f.fac_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as fac_date , p.pro_name, f.fac_status, f.wash_cycle, f.ins_cycle, to_char(f.last_inspection, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as last_inspection, f.fac_manager, f.fac_function, f.fac_picture from facility f join process p on(f.pro_code = p.pro_code) where fac_name like '%' || #{facName} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into facility (fac_code , fac_name , fac_date, pro_code , wash_cycle, ins_cycle, last_inspection, fac_manager, fac_function) values(('FAC' || lpad(facility_seq.nextval, 4,'0')) , #{facName} , #{facDate} , #{proCode}, #{washCycle},#{insCycle}, #{lastInspection}, #{facManager}, #{facFunction})
mapper.update: update facility set fac_name = #{facName}, fac_date = #{facDate} , pro_code = #{proCode}, wash_cycle = #{washCycle} , ins_cycle = #{insCycle}, last_inspection = #{lastInspection}, fac_manager = #{facManager}, fac_function = #{facFunction}, fac_picture = #{facPicture} where fac_code = #{facCode}
mapper.select: select f.fac_name, i.fac_code, i.down_code, i.ins_code, to_char(i.ins_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as ins_date, i.ins_reason, i.ins_history, i.judgment, i.part_history, i.part_reason, i.part_date, i.ins_manager from facility f join inspection i on(f.fac_code = i.fac_code) where ins_code is not null order by ins_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into inspection(ins_code, ins_date, ins_reason, ins_history, judgment, part_history, part_reason, part_date, ins_manager, fac_code, down_code) values(('INS' || lpad(inspection_seq.nextval, 4,'0')) , sysdate, #{insReason}, #{insHistory}, #{judgment}, #{partHistory}, #{partReason}, #{partDate}, #{insManager}, #{facCode}, #{downCode})
mapper.update: update inspection set ins_date = #{insDate}, ins_reason = #{insReason} , ins_history = #{insHistory}, judgment = #{judgment} , ins_manager = #{insManager}, part_history = #{partHistory}, part_reason = #{partReason}, part_date = #{partDate} where ins_code = #{insCode}
